at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.fileutils

Class ExportUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.tuwien.ifs.somtoolbox.apps.viewer.fileutils.ExportUtils

  • public class ExportUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to export visualisations as images and complete maps as HTML.
    Version:
    $Id: ExportUtils.java 4162 2011-02-11 16:40:02Z mayer $
    Author:
    Rudolf Mayer
